title: relation to Food Legislation) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 79 of 2020), make the
heading: 1. The following laboratory is designated as an official laboratory:
text_raw:
1. The following laboratory is designated as an official laboratory: 

The State Laboratory 

Backweston Laboratory Campus 

Celbridge 

Co. Kildare.
text_norm: 1 following laboratory designated official laboratory state laboratory backweston laboratory campus celbridge co kildare

title: relation to Food Legislation) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 79 of 2020), make the
heading: 2. The members of the following class of persons are designated as
text_raw:
2. The members of the following class of persons are designated as 

approved examiners at the above designated official laboratory: 

Chemists at or above the grade of Chemist III. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

4 July, 2022. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 8th July, 2022.
